frontmatter.name: swSMBendState_e
frontmatter.description: Bend state values for a sheet metal part.

title: swSMBendState_e
description: Bend state values for a sheet metal part.

values.description: = The bends are flattened; the model is rolled back to just after a FlattenBends feature, but just before the corresponding ProcessBends feature
= The bends are folded; the model is rolled back to just after a FlattenBends ProcessBends feature pair
= Not a sheet metal part; no SheetMetal features present
= The bends are in their sharp state; the part is rolled back to just before the first FlattenBends feature
